The BNO055 is a System in Package (SiP), integrating a triaxial 14-bit accelerometer, a triaxial 16-bit gyroscope with a range of ±2000 degrees per second, a triaxial geomagnetic sensor and a 32-bit microcontroller running the BSX3.0 FusionLib software.
BNO055為系統級封裝 (SiP)，整合一組三軸14位元加速度計、一組範圍為每秒±2000度之三軸16位元陀螺儀、一組三軸地磁感測器和一組以BSX3.0 FusionLib軟體運行之32位元微控制器。

The Leonardo ETH is a microcontroller board based on the ATmega32U4 (datasheet) and the new W5500 TCP/IP Embedded Ethernet Controller (datasheet). It has 20 digital input/output pins (of which 7 can be used as PWM outputs and 12 as analog inputs), a 16 MHz crystal oscillator, a RJ45 connection, a micro USB connector, a power jack, an ICSP header, and a reset button.
The Leonardo ETH係以ATmega32U4（數據資料表）和新款W5500 TCP/IP嵌入式乙太網路控制器（數據資料表）為基礎架構之微控制器電路板，它具有20組數位輸入/輸出針腳（其中針腳7可作為PWM輸出而針腳12為類比輸入）、 16 MHz晶體振蕩器、RJ45連接口、micro USB連接口、電源接口、ICSP頭座針腳以及重置按鈕。
The Leonardo has 12 analog inputs, labeled A0 through A11, all of which can also be used as digital i/o.
Leonardo 具有 12 個類比輸入，標示為 A0 至 A11，所有的類比輸入也能用作數位 i/o。

• 250 mm ball screw Zaxis stroke with astandard 150 mm clearance.
• 250 mm 滾珠螺桿 Z 軸行程，含 150 mm 間隙。
• Additional tooling options include drills, tangential and drag knives and plasma arc cutters.
• 額外的刀具配件包括鑽頭、裁刀、拖刀以及電漿電弧切削器等。
• All vacuum hold down beds come configured with a minimum of 5 independently controlled zones foroptimum hold down management.
• 所有真空固定床皆設置最少 5 個獨立控制區以最佳化固定管理。
• Automatic compensation for all location, rotation, stretch and skew distortions
• 自動補償所有位置、旋轉、拉伸和扭曲變形
• Fully integrated with AXYZ A2MC controller
• 完全整合 AXYZ A2MC 控制器
• Intuitive operator interface with full colour graphical image for fast and accurate operation
• 直覺的操作介面，彩色圖形化的圖像可供快速、準確地操作
• Standard aluminium universal hold down bed combines T-Slot clamping with vacuum hold down distribution system.
• 標準鋁萬用固定床，結合 T 形夾槽和真空固定系統。
• Standard connectivity to NC files from virtually any CAM software package including AXYZ PANELBuilder, EnRoute, ArtCam, Type 3,Mastercam, ProfileLab and more.
• 標準支援包括 AXYZ PANELBuilder、EnRoute、ArtCam、Type 3、Mastercam、ProfileLab 以及更多 CAM 套裝軟體之 NC 檔案。
• Works with programs from any CAM software
• 適用於任何 CAM 軟體之程式
